title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Some habits are so routine that theyre hard to see. However, a sudden shift in your frame of reference is possible while Venus and Mars connect with Uranus the Awakener in your 5th House of Spontaneity. You might angrily shut down an emotionally charged discussion prematurely or show your annoyance when someone doesnt listen to your advice. In any case, a surprising insight about a relationship can broaden your perspective on your connections with people in general. Indira Gandhi said, You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
